ComicInfo.Summary:
Chun-Li and Ken are trapped in dark dimension full of ghouls, demons, and monstrosities, and things only go from bad to worse with the arrival of Lord Raptor - the heavy metal god of the undead! The crossover chaos continues in Street Fighter Vs. Darkstalkers!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Edwin Huang | 1 | B | Cover B | Rob Porter | 2 | C | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover C | Joe Vriens | 3 | D | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Cover D | Warren Louw | 4 | *Notes:* The 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover is a homage of the movie poster for The Creature from the Black Lagoon.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/street-fighter-vs-darkstalkers-2-oros-weakness/4000-599926/
